Mission.Title: Mission 1 - First Contact with an Unknown Enemy
Mission.Descr: They are coming! They are everywhere!

Mission.Title: Mission 2 - Attack, Do Not Let Them Go
Mission.Descr: Damned raiders here! No Mercy! Kill them all!

Mission.Title: Mission 3 - Counterattack Is The Best Defense
Mission.Descr: Our base is under attack! Stop the aliens` attack now!

Mission.Title: Mission 4 - Attack on Fleet of Pirate Raiders
Mission.Descr: Find a pirate raider base in this sector!

Mission.Title: Mission 5 - Surprise, Surprise... Aliens Again
Mission.Descr: Do not let them regroup for a counterattack!

Mission.Title: Mission 6 - Stop Alien MotherShip Now!
Mission.Descr: They are too close! You should do something!

Mission.Title: Mission 7 - Attack on Small Pirate Raiders Base
Mission.Descr: We found their base! Finally! Lets smash them!

Mission.Title: Mission 8 - Stay Close, They Are Coming
Mission.Descr: Looks like the aliens got reinforcements!

Mission.Title: Mission 9 - One More Pirate Raiders Base
Mission.Descr: This should be a piece of cake for you, do it quickly!

Mission.Title: Mission 10 - Strange Slackness... Be Ready!
Mission.Descr: Our intelligence failed to find anything. It could be a trap!

Mission.Title: Mission 11 - Do Not Let Them Destroy Our Base!
Mission.Descr: Do not panic! We've got reinforcements! Regroup and attack!

Mission.Title: Mission 12 - Secret Pirate Base
Mission.Descr: They are too smart now, and much more dangerous.

Mission.Title: Mission 13 - Alien Transportation Port
Mission.Descr: We found their hyper port! We must destroy it right now!

Mission.Title: Mission 14 - Last Pirate Enclave
Mission.Descr: This sector must be clear and safe for ever!

Mission.Title: Mission 15 - Escape Under Aliens` Attack
Mission.Descr: We lost this sector, this battle is lost. Try to escape!
